snippet: Adjusted for inflation, per capita disposable personal income has yet to recover to the peak reached in 2008. Household net worth, also adjusted for inflation and measured on a per capita basis, is still nearly 20 percent below the high reached in...
lead_paragraph: Adjusted for inflation, per capita disposable personal income has yet to recover to the peak reached in 2008. Household net worth, also adjusted for inflation and measured on a per capita basis, is still nearly 20 percent below the high reached in 2007. The charts show four-year changes in both figures, both before and after adjusting for inflation.

headline.seo: Off the Charts: Earning Less and Worth Less
